nodes.text: Malthee was a city on the planet Kinyen. After the Gran refused to give in to the Empire's demands to increase food production and request for more access to Kinyen, the Empire bombarded the heavily populated city, leaving a crater in its place. The Gran built a Doellinist temple and a memorial on the site of the crater.
Rebel agents secretly met with Doellinist priests in the ruins of Malthee.
